channel.title: News on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in News on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: October Visitor
item.description: The October Visitor is available online.

item.title: Friendship Sunday School Class Update
item.description: The Friendship class resumed meeting on Sunday, October 11 and will plan to meet at 9:30 AM on the second and fourth Sunday until the end of the year.

item.title: Care Ministry
item.description: by Cheryl Flaherty Due to state restrictions on large gatherings, we will not have the Harvest Dinner in November.

item.title: Visitor Articles
item.description: If you would like an announcement in the December Visitor, please email it to Wade by Sunday, November 15.

item.title: In-Person Check-Ins
item.description: If you have been at church the last week several weeks, you noticed our greeters getting you checked in on iPads.

item.title: Donâ€™t Be Too Early
item.description: On Sunday, November 1, we will turn back our clocks because of daylight savings time change.

item.title: Christmas Gifts for Staff
item.description: While we will not be able to do a live presentation of gifts, we are planning to present Christmas gifts to our church staff.

item.title: Holiday Service Plans
item.description: Because of Covid 19 and difficulties in social distancing in a crowded sanctuary, First Baptist Church will not host its traditional live Christmas Eve service this year.

item.title: Facebook Live Prayer Time
item.description: During this season of social distancing, we continue a weekly Facebook Live prayer time!

item.title: YouTube Channel
item.description: If you are not able to make it in person to church, you can join us online each Sunday.
